hadith.chapter: To make the Heart Tender (Ar-Riqaq) - كتاب الرقاق
hadith.arabic-text: حدثنا علي بن عبد الله، حدثنا حرمي بن عمارة، حدثنا شعبة، عن معبد بن خالد، أنه سمع حارثة بن وهب، يقول سمعت النبي صلى الله عليه وسلم وذكر الحوض فقال ‏"‏ كما بين المدينة وصنعاء ‏"‏‏.‏
hadith.english-text: Narrated Haritha bin Wahb: I heard the Prophet mentioning the Lake-Fount (Al-Kauthar), saying, "(The width of the Lake-Fount) is equal to the distance between Medina and Sana' (capital of Yemen)." Haritha said that he heard the Prophet saying that his Lake-Fount would be as large as the distance between Sana' and Medina. Al- Mustaurid said to Haritha, "Didn't you hear him talking about the vessels?" He said, "No." Al- Mustaurid said, "The vessels are seen in it as (numberless as) the stars."
